jobExperience.summary: Dev Lead on the Plesk Platform- a for a Windows Shared Hosting platform that hosts 490,000 websites consuming ~300 TB of data, 120,000 MSSQL servers and 145,000 MySql databases.

General Responsibilities: Worked with my team's PM to oversee, plan and cost out our initiatives
Continued my duties as Scrum Master
Managed a team of developers overseeing their careers and promotions
Successfully mentored multiple college interns, each leading to a job offer
Accomplishments: Partnered with product owners to reduce our backlog by 20%
Continuous refactoring of our REST APIs, leading to a 20% code reduction in 2023
API conversion of AuthZ from Basic to Bearer Token and Mutual TLS
Created integration test suite used to verify our DEV and TEST environments
Converted systems to use AWS/ASM for secrets management
Successfully migrated more than 130,000 customers from legacy hosting to Plesk
Hypervisor and VM upgrades (>800 servers) to latest versions of Windows / Plesk
Created / Implemented a process to migrate customer DNS (more than 100,000 sites)
Led the team and created 90% of the product’s threat models

jobExperience.summary: SDE III on the Plesk Plaform

Responsibilities and Accomplishments: Began duties as my product’s Scrum Master
Developed a replacement management UI for the platform using React
Developed the next gen shared hosting platform as a replacement for 4gh windows
Implemented our CI/CD infrastructure using Jenkins, Powershell, Git, and .Net
Implemented a monolithic API on .Net to manage our platform
Created a service that integrated with Kafka as a consumer

jobExperience.summary: SDET II on 4gh and Virtual Data Center Teams

Responsibilities and Accomplishments: Golden image test automation, reducing test time from 2 days to 2 hours
Verified the UI for 4gh hosting product, bringing an improved file manager to market

jobExperience.summary: Team that keeps spam out of your Inbox

Responsibilities and Accomplishments: Responsible for maintaining the antispam training systems used within Outlook, Exchange and Hotmail
Designed and Tested URS, a high capacity web service that handled approximately half a billion raw hits per day
Involved in the testing and validation of the Safety Platform's Malware focused site reputation system
